Title: Squigboss with Gnasha-squig
Legend: Squigbosses command their fungal herds through the offering of prized mushrooms and occasional jabbings from their Squig-krooks. Most are accompanied by loyal Gnasha-squigs, who gleefully chomp at anything who gets too close.
Intro: A Squigboss with Gnasha-squig is armed with a Squig-krook.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Squiggly Hangerz-on

Rules.Name: Companion
Rules.Rule: COMPANION: This unit is accompanied by Gnasha-squig armed with a Fang-filled Gob.

Rules.Name: Release Da Squigs
Rules.Fluff: The Squigboss chucks a handful of Looncaps into the path of nearby squigs, sending the beasts into a frenzy as they race to snack on the tasty shrooms.
Rules.Rule: If you do so, each friendly SQUIG HERD unit wholly within 12" of this unit that has not moved this phase can make a normal move.
